title: FEEDBACK FROM DeSpace PROJECTS
des: What contributors says about the ecosystem.

opinion.name: Rod Mamin
opinion.comment: I dedicated my whole life to developping decentralized lunar space engineering and I am grateful I do it thanks to initiatives like DeSpace QF

opinion.name: Adam
opinion.comment: There is a total shift of paradigm, and being here make me feel I am part of the shift.

opinion.name: Red Boumghar
opinion.comment: The world is moving fast, space faster, DeSpace QF is for me a way to keep up with it, and to provide our project, Space DAO a solid sustainable base of people and funds.

opinion.name: Dockrel Kahn
opinion.comment: Trust us we looked for a very long time and wasted thousands of dollars testing other teams, freelancers, and outsource companies.
